  • Classes in org.apache.hama.ml.classification used by org.apache.hama.ml.classification 
    Class and Description
    ClassifierAdapter
    A ClassifierAdapter assigns a label of type O to inputs of type I by the adapted implementation of a classification algorithm.
    ClassifierConfigurationAdapter
    Adapter interface for classifier's configurations and parameters.
